claim: You can see the Statue of Freedom from the Statue of Liberty.

supporting.text: The Statue of Liberty is located in New York Harbor, while the Statue of Freedom is atop the U.S. Capitol in Washington, D.C., approximately 225 miles apart, making direct visibility impossible.

attacks.text: The Statue of Liberty is located in New York Harbor, while the Statue of Freedom is atop the U.S. Capitol in Washington, D.C., approximately 225 miles apart, making direct visibility impossible.
